strings.STR_L_HTML5: This game uses HTML5. If it loads but does not run, please update your web browser
strings.ICE_HOW_TO_GOAL: Go as far as you can!
strings.FIRE_HOW_TO_TAP: Tap the notes at the line
strings.FIRE_HOW_TO_FILL: Fill the power bar to attack
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_RUN_MOBILE: Tap on the left of the screen to run
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_RUN: Tap the right arrow key to run
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_JUMP_MOBILE: Tap on the right of the screen to jump
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_DISCO: Activate disco mode for double points
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_OBSTACLES: Obstacles will slow you down, avoid them!
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_SLIME: Don't get caught by the slime
strings.SLIME_HOW_TO_GOAL: Go as far as you can!
strings.CANDY_HOW_TO_CANDY: Tap the candy people to rescue them
strings.CANDY_HOW_TO_ZOMBIES: Don't tap the zombies or you'll lose a life
strings.CANDY_HOW_TO_LIFEBACK: Hit Lemongrab 3 times to get a life back
strings.FIRE_DESKTOP_TUTORIAL_1: Click the notes on the line.
strings.FIRE_MOBILE_TUTORIAL_1: Tap the notes on the line.
strings.DONT_WORKS: Sorry! This game doesnâ€™t work on your device.
